price: هغه مو له يو رښتيني مقصد پرته هسې نه دي پيدا كړي خو د هغوى زياتره نه پوهيږي.
arabic: مَا خَلَقۡنَٰهُمَآ إِلَّا بِٱلۡحَقِّ وَلَٰكِنَّ أَكۡثَرَهُمۡ لَا يَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: mā khalaqnāhumā illā bil-ḥaqi walākinna aktharahum lā yaʿlamūna
